70010000056856.description:
There’s nothing quite like a bit of creative, relaxing fun in the form of block-building ^^

Reconstruct three sets of islands in the Build Lands mode, or build and share your own ones in the Land Editor!

With a wide choice of blocks, the sky (and island size) is the limit to what you can make!

Will it be pretty mountain cabins, castle premises, forests… or something else entirely?
70010000056856.intro: Hand-craft your own islands – block by block!
70010000056856.name: Build Lands

70010000071665.description:
Descending in the darkness of a long-abandoned facility, a lone ship searches for wealth, power and the scattered pieces of the past.
•••••••••••••••••••••

Star of Providence is a top down action shooter with procedurally generated elements. Explore a progression of floors as you make your way into the depths of the facility, encountering increasingly deadly enemies, fantastic weapons, upgrades, choices and revelations as you venture deeper towards a great and calamitous power.

Features:
• Smooth, gracious, fast action gameplay, tailored to feel good to play.
• Over 40 types of weapons with over 50 unique modifiers for a ludicrous number of combinations.
• Intricate and energetic chiptune soundtrack to complement the beat of the action.
• Looping! Every game loop beaten unlocks a yet harder one.
• Multiple playable characters

•••••••••••••••••••••
May Power Eternal grant you everlasting life.
70010000071665.intro: Descend into the facility and seek out power eternal in this shoot em up masterpiece!
70010000071665.name: Star of Providence

70010000077762.description:
Dodge, roll, block incoming cats!

Use power-ups to turn the scores. If you've always wanted to catch your friends with a giant laser pointer or shoot'em with a cheese cannon you can do it all! Just watch out for those flying yarn balls.

Play with up to 4 players (including bots) in 4 game modes.

Grow your kitten collection and collect them all. Complete various tasks and secret challenges and you're reward will be... You guessed right, more kittens.

Master all the levels, so you won't lose one of your nine lives. If surviving the power-ups isn't tricky enough, you'll have to watch out for crazy traps too. Surely moving cars, blackouts and eagles aren't that bad.
70010000077762.intro: Knock down your enemies and collect all the cats and achievements in this pixel art party game for true cat lovers
70010000077762.name: TactiCats

70010000080484.description:
Dive into the vibrant world of an enthralling anime idol dance game that invites you to join the journey of nine unique idols, each with their own dreams, outfits, favorite locations and favorite songs. 
In this captivating adventure, you'll have the chance to dance alongside your favorite characters through 35 mesmerizing levels, each offering two distinct difficulties to challenge and delight players of all skill levels.
As you step into the glittering shoes of each idol, you'll dance your way through a variety of enchanting stages, from mesmerizing Sci-Fi cities to unknown dystopian futuristic planets. With every beat and rhythm, immerse yourself in the thrilling gameplay that combines intuitive controls with exhilarating music tracks, ensuring every performance feels as thrilling as a live concert.
But the rewards are as sweet as the journey! 
With each level you conquer, unlock breathtaking images of your character dancing, capturing their spirit and passion in stunning visuals that celebrate your progress. These exclusive images not only serve as tokens of your achievements but also deepen your connection with the characters, offering glimpses into their lives and dreams.
This is a journey through a world full of fun, dancing, and anime, wrapped in a dazzling package of music, and exciting visuals. Whether you're a seasoned rhythm game aficionado or a newcomer eager to explore the world of anime idols, this game promises an unforgettable experience, blending the thrill of performance with the heartwarming tales of ambition, friendship, and success. 
Join us on this dazzling adventure, and let the rhythm lead the way to stardom!
70010000080484.intro: Step into a universe where music and movement collide in a spectacular party experience for seasoned rhythm gamers and newcomers.
70010000080484.name: Anime Dance-Off - Space Party

70010000082436.description:
You thought they’d come from space? Wrong!
It’s up to you alone to stop an alien invasion from the depths of the ocean in this legendary, home computer era shoot ‘em up, dredged up and faithfully rebuilt for modern platforms – X-Out: Resurfaced!

Resurfaced:
In 1990, the year of X-Out’s initial release on Amiga, it stood out as a breath of fresh seaside air in the stale shoot 'em-up space.

It didn’t take place in “space” as so many games of its genre did (and still do) but instead went for a dive through underwater worlds.
But what really pushed it further than its side-scrolling competitors was its shop system, allowing players to mix and match from a wide variety of ships, weapons, and other accessories to build their fleet. This made every playthrough (attempt) feel different and unique.

In 2024 the highly challenging underwater shoot ‘em up from the game development legends at Rainbow Arts is finally returning.
ININ and Ziggurat have collaborated to bring you a faithful remake completely rebuilt from the ground up and greatly improved.

Redrawn:
The impressive sprite work of yesteryear has not only been remade into even more impressive modern high-resolution sprites but also greatly expanded upon with particle and lighting effects. 8 varied stages, the enemies, the bosses, the ships, the projectiles—everything shines in a brand-new light!

Remixed:
Apart from the visual journey of each playthrough, you’ll embark on a musical one as well: epic synth soundscapes that drive you forward by the magnificent Chris Hülsbeck. In addition to him remastering his original works, we have created six entirely new tracks as well.

Remembered:
And it's not just Chris Hülsbeck who has returned for this remake: Ogan Kandemiroglu, the brother and co-artist of Celal Kandemiroglu who created the original iconic key art of X-Out, took on that task for the remake as a tribute.

Re-equipped:
The shop system is back and thoroughly improved as well: new preconfigured load-outs allow you to jump straight into the action, added item descriptions help new cadets configure and build their fleet, and we've FINALLY marked the available slots for your weaponry.

Reinforced:
Should you still feel overwhelmed by X-Out’s challenge, then maybe it’s time for a co-captain. Enlist a friend and face the terrors from the ocean deep together in the local 2-player co-op mode!

Reversed:
If you think you’ve seen everything there is to the game already, then prepare to have your bearing changed and your gyro twisted in the Mirror Mode with its reverse-scrolling levels!

Recapped:
• Experience a fresh but faithful take on a real shoot-’em-up classic!
• Get dazzled by the new and beautiful sprite work mixed with shiny particle and lighting effects!
• Take a journey through new and old synth soundscapes courtesy of composer legend Chris Hülsbeck!
• Choose one of three load-outs or build your own fleet in the improved shop system!
• Grab a trusty ally and face the depths together in a 2-player couch co-op dive!
• Get your world flipped, turned upside down in the Mirror Mode!
70010000082436.intro: Relive the deep-sea classic! X-Out reemerges on console as X-Out: Resurfaced.
70010000082436.name: X-Out: Resurfaced

70010000084546.description:
This puzzle game delivers a satisfying experience as you connect sand grains of the same color and clear them all at once. The more grains you connect, the higher your score when you clear them.

Connect grains of the same color to make them disappear. In “ARRANGE” mode, special grains will appear, and in the “+” mode, the stages will expand, giving you more room to play.
70010000084546.intro: Feel the thrill of clearing connected sand grains all at once!
70010000084546.name: 3°C: Sand Puzzle

70010000086364.description:
Prison Guard Simulator lets you step into the shoes of a prison guard in a high-security facility. Maintain order, discipline, and security while making decisions that shape your reputation and the stability of the prison.
Patrol cell blocks, resolve conflicts, manage contraband, and face unexpected challenges like riots and escape attempts. Your decisions—whether handling conflicts with authority or empathy—will affect the prison’s operations and inmate behavior.

Features:
	•	Realistic Prison Environment: Explore detailed areas like cell blocks, the yard, mess hall, and more.
	•	Dynamic Daily Tasks: Handle roll calls, inspections, patrolling, and emergency situations.
	•	Decision-Making That Matters: Shape prison dynamics through your choices in handling conflicts and crises.
	•	Inmate Management System: Monitor inmates’ behavior and prevent chaos before it begins.
	•	Career Progression: Climb the ranks, unlock new challenges, and access advanced duties.

Will you rise through the ranks and maintain order, or let chaos take over? The choice is yours.
70010000086364.intro: Face the challenge. Keep the peace. Survive the pressure.
70010000086364.name: Prison Guard: Warden Simulator

70010000087105.description:
Based on the world and characters of Rune Factory 3 Special, 4 Special and 5, work your way through hundreds of puzzles.
Complete puzzles to unlock the real-world counterparts and use them to customise your farm, plant vegetables, recruit monsters, and choose your farm location to create your own unique Rune Factory 3D scene!

Select your weapon and go head-to-head in puzzle battles with the monsters from Rune Factory. A right move will deal damage on the monster, but a wrong move will inflict damage on you. Can you solve the puzzle before your time is up?

As you complete the puzzles and capture monsters, a compendium of characters and bestiary of monsters unlocks, where you can view everybody's likes and dislikes, as well as view all monsters in 3D.

There is also a journal to track your progress and a music player to listen to the 60+ included tracks from Rune Factory 3 Special, 4 Special and 5. 

You can even choose a marriage partner from the bachelors you uncover.

Choose if you’d like to solve a puzzle as either black & white, colour, or both, in challenge mode or play at your own pace!

Features
* Gorgeous 3D art from Rune Factory 3 Special, Rune Factory 4 Special, and Rune Factory 5.
* 450 puzzles you can play as either black & white or colour nonograms!
* 20 collage puzzles, made up of many smaller puzzles, both in classic and colour variations!
* Fight and capture monsters!
* Uncover villagers and bachelors!
* Unlock entries in the in-game Bestiary and learn more about the monsters of Rigbarth!
* Detailed play statistics for the most ardent nonogram fanatics!
* Play how you want: laid-back and relaxed or challenging!
* Controller and touch-screen input
* A wealth of puzzle options to tweak the experience to your exact liking!
* Accessibility options, including dyslexia font, colour vision support and left or right-handed touch-screen interface.
* 40 special achievements to unlock!
70010000087105.intro: Solve fun Piczle logic puzzles created from the world of Rune Factory!
70010000087105.name: Piczle Cross: Rune Factory

70010000087373.description:
2222 A.D. The earth we loved was devastated.
We embark on an endless journey in search of a new planet to live on.

You will embark on a journey aboard a spaceship.
Spacecraft are evolving, and they need space fuel in the form of rings.

Collect rings and aim for a new star.

■About rules
The controls are very simple.
Press the button to ascend the spaceship.
When you release the button, gravity pulls the spaceship down.
Collect rings while avoiding walls and obstacles.

There are two game modes, "stage mode" and "endless mode".

The rings you collect can be used in the in-game shop. You can purchase "wall color", "spaceship type", and "background" in the SHOP, and you can customize the game.

Experience the simple but unstoppable world of "2222" once you start playing.
70010000087373.name: 2222 Abyss of the Universe

70010000088781.description:
Step into a world of mystery, beauty, and emotion with Wet Whispers – Anime Shift Puzzles! This immersive and atmospheric puzzle game invites players to piece together stunning, anime-inspired artworks, each brimming with intricate details and evocative themes. As each puzzle piece falls into place, a captivating image is revealed, creating a sense of accomplishment and wonder.

Set in a world where whispers of the rain and soft, melancholic tones fill the atmosphere, Wet Whispers offers more than just a traditional puzzle experience. The game’s soothing ambiance, combined with beautiful anime art, immerses players in a deeply emotional journey. Every puzzle solved unveils artwork that tells its own story—whether it’s a calm, serene scene or a dark, mysterious moment, each piece you fit together pulls you deeper into its narrative.

The game features a wide range of beautifully crafted anime illustrations, each designed to challenge the mind and engage the player with varying levels of complexity. From simple puzzles for a relaxing experience to intricate ones that push puzzle-solving skills to the limit, Wet Whispers ensures there's something for every type of player. Players can adjust difficulty settings to match their skill level, allowing the game to be enjoyed by both casual gamers and seasoned puzzle enthusiasts.

The blend of atmospheric sounds, including the subtle backdrop of raindrops, adds to the immersive experience, making Wet Whispers not only a game but a sensory escape. As each puzzle unfolds, the sense of accomplishment is accompanied by the satisfaction of uncovering beautiful artwork that was hidden beneath the scattered pieces.

Whether seeking relaxation after a long day or desiring a mental challenge to test puzzle-solving abilities, Wet Whispers – Anime Shift Puzzles provides a soothing yet engaging experience that leaves players captivated. Each puzzle tells a unique story, and with every piece that fits, the beauty of the anime art grows clearer. The game’s combination of serene art, captivating themes, and tranquil atmosphere offers a perfect escape into a world where every shift of the pieces brings players closer to unlocking the secrets of the art and its emotional depth.

Perfect for those who appreciate the calming effects of puzzles, Wet Whispers invites players to explore a mesmerizing collection of artwork, solve challenges, and enjoy a peaceful yet intriguing experience. Dive into the world of Wet Whispers—where every puzzle piece is a whisper of beauty waiting to be revealed.
70010000088781.intro: Solve captivating anime puzzles with Wet Whispers – Anime Shift Puzzles, where every piece unlocks beautiful, moody art!
70010000088781.name: Wet Whispers - Anime Shift Puzzles

70010000089740.description:
There are three games included!

◆Gigant Mom Buster
Your favorite Marma has grown huge and is rampaging!
Hit him with poo and get your normal Marma back! There's also a naughty option!
Easy-to-use, exhilarating action!

◆LUNLUN Poop Break
Break the oncoming horde of poo with a bullet!
Refresh yourself with a special finishing move!
A fast-paced action shooting game!

◆LUNLUN Super Hero Babys DX
The great adventure of LUNLUN, the super baby, who was eaten by the gigantic “Boss Poop”!
A side-scrolling action game with easy controls that won't result in a game over!

*Differences from the single-item version
・The stage composition has been partially changed.
・The strength of the bosses has been changed.
・A skip button has been added for the ending, etc.
・The amount of recovery from recovery items during boss battles has increased.
・Also, various other things.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
70010000089740.intro:
Three games in one! Volume up!
A compilation of Super Baby LUNLUN's action
! A super bargain edition!
70010000089740.name: Pixel Game Maker Series LUNLUN SUPER HERO BABIES PLUS NEWGAMES

70010000090497.description:
Step into the ultimate holiday shopping adventure with Santa's Supermarket Simulator! Experience the festive frenzy as you take on the role of manager of the jolliest store in town. Oversee aisles packed with gifts, goodies, and holiday cheer while ensuring the shop runs smoothly for all the holiday shoppers.

Enjoy exciting simulator features like:
-Shop Management: Stock shelves, organize displays, and ensure everything is ready for the busiest season of the year.
-Customer Satisfaction: Handle a steady stream of shoppers, ensuring they find everything on their wish lists.
-Inventory Control: Keep track of stock levels and reorder popular items to avoid empty shelves.
-Shop Upgrades: Unlock new sections, improve efficiency, and expand your supermarket to handle the holiday rush.

As the administrator of Santa's Supermarket, it’s up to you to create a magical shopping experience and make this the merriest season ever!
70010000090497.intro: Fill your cart with Joy and Jingles!
70010000090497.name: Christmas Store: Santa's Supermarket Simulator

70010000090517.description:
"Othello" is a game of Reversi released by SUCCESS in 1984.
The rules are extremely simple while still requiring widely varied strategies, for fun and depth independent of luck.
This title includes features to help players practice and learn strategies, such as to evaluate your moves or to undo moves once made.

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
70010000090517.intro: Timeless gameplay that never fails to get intense!
70010000090517.name: Arcade Archives Othello

70010000090643.description: DAMN! is an electrifying twin-stick shooter that propels you into a whirlwind of action and intensity. Dive into an immersive experience with lightning-fast gameplay that will keep your adrenaline pumping and your reflexes sharp. Campaign Mode: Embark on an epic journey through 25 meticulously crafted missions, each presenting unique challenges and objectives. Whether it's rescuing hostages, destroying enemy strongholds, or surviving waves of relentless foes, every mission offers a fresh and exhilarating experience. Arsenal of Destruction: Unleash your inner warrior with a diverse arsenal of weapons. From the devastating power of the Shotgun to the scorching flames of the Flamethrower, the precision of the Redirect Laser, the overwhelming force of the Chain Gun, and the strategic deployment of the Mine Layer, you'll have everything you need to annihilate your enemies. Master each weapon's unique mechanics and find the perfect combination to dominate the battlefield. Arena Mode: Test your skills in the Arena levels, where only the best can survive. Compete against other players and climb to the top of the Steam leaderboards. Prove your worth and show the world that you have what it takes to be the ultimate champion. Gameplay Experience: DAMN! offers an 'easy to learn, hard to master' play style that ensures maximum mindless fun. The intuitive controls make it accessible to beginners, while the challenging gameplay provides seasoned players with endless hours of excitement and replayability. Perfect your strategies, hone your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate shooting experience. Visuals and Sound: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals and an atmospheric soundtrack that complements the fast-paced action. Every explosion, every shot, and every victory is accompanied by high-quality sound effects that enhance your gaming experience.
70010000090643.intro: The robots are your enemies, annihilate them!
70010000090643.name: DAMN

70010000090803.description:
Welcome to a world of strategic card-based RPG, where you are tasked with liberating the forest kingdom from the tyranny of the Mad King.
Your story begins with the main character, once close to the royal family, who becomes a victim of false accusations. When the King’s daughter, the princess, mysteriously disappears, he descends into panic and starts suspecting a conspiracy among his subjects. As a result, numerous innocent people face harsh persecution and imprisonment.
You are the one accused of the princess’s disappearance. To prove your innocence and restore order to the kingdom, you must journey to the castle for an audience with the King and his advisor. But first, you must navigate the perilous forest, populated by various beings—Barons and other forest dwellers—who seek to capture you for royal favor and reward. Some of them have been misled or coerced into the hunt.
Throughout your journey, you will encounter unique forest inhabitants, explore four diverse regions, and collect powerful items and cards that will empower your hero. Your ultimate path will lead you to the royal castle, where you'll strive to reach the throne room.
Will you restore justice and bring peace back to the kingdom? What choice will you make? The outcome of this story lies solely in your hands.
70010000090803.intro: Strategic card-based RPG, where you are tasked with liberating the forest kingdom from the tyranny of the Mad King.
70010000090803.name: Deep, In the Forest

70010000090888.description:
This Go game software features a 'gaming console-exclusive AI' optimised purely for strength and analytical power, focusing on match functionality.

● 14 Levels of Difficulty from Beginner to 4 Dan
The computer's strength is divided into 14 levels.
You can play against opponents tailored to your skill level, ranging from "Beginner" for newcomers to "4 Dan" for those seeking the ultimate challenge.

● "Analysis" Feature that shows how the AI would play.
The AI analyses your game and displays suggested moves to show how it would play in your position.
Select your thinking level from "1 Dan" to "4 Dan" and display [win rate display] and [good move/bad move display].
From the graph for each move, you can find out which moves led to wins and losses, and where improvements are needed.
Winning rate display: Displays the winning rate analysed by AI in a graph for each move.
Good/bad move display: AI analyses the moves you made and displays good/bad moves.

● "Reading Lines" Feature to View the Basis of Suggestions
You can view the reasoning behind the AI's suggested moves through its Reading Lines.
Select thinking levels from 1 Dan to 4 Dan and preview sequences 3, 5, 7, 9, or 11 moves ahead.
This helps clarify why the AI made certain decisions.

● Additional Features
Joseki Display: Shows common opening patterns.
Hint Function: Provides suggestions during the game.
2-Player Matches: Play against another person.
Real-Time Territory Estimation: Displays territory as the game progresses.
Game Record Save and Load: Save your game records or resume a game from a saved state.
Game Record Input: Manually input moves for review or analysis.
70010000090888.intro: Push the Limits of Strength with a Dedicated Gaming Console AI!
70010000090888.name: GINSEI IGO: AI Teaches You How to Play Go

70010000091353.description:
Penalty Shootout is a short and simple game.

Shoot the ball as hard as you can to score goals. Then switch and try to save all the shots from your opponent!

Each side will have 10 attempts. Score as many goals as possible to be victorious!
70010000091353.name: Learn to Play - Penalty Shootout

70010000092023.description:
Kypros, consisting of the continent of Zaius and the seven islands surrounding it, had long been a peaceful place under the rule of the royal family. However, the ancient seal was broken by Bido Klerant, a man desiring great power, and his subordinates, the Seven Beast Generals. As a result, the Dark God Emperor Daar was resurrected. Empowered by the evil god, Bido began to secretly move in order to control Kypros.

“Burai : Jōkan” is an RPG released by Riverhill Soft in 1989 in Japan. It features eight brave heroes, including pirates, fortune-tellers, and the leader of the dragon clan, and follows their heroic adventures. With as many as eight protagonist-level characters, it can be hard to become emotionally invested, but the game starts before the heroes meet each other. In the early stages, you’ll come to understand each hero’s background and circumstances, ensuring that you’ll grow attached to the characters.

The dramatic storyline they weave is one of the major attractions of the game. Another notable feature in the system is the “Action” command, which allows characters to improve their abilities even outside of battles, as well as the fact that each hero has weapon compatibility settings. Evaluating each hero’s strengths and deciding how to develop them is an essential element in progressing through the game.


*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000092023.intro: An RPG set in the world of Kypros, comprising the continent of Zaius and the seven islands. The story features eight heroes, including pirates, fortune tellers.
70010000092023.name: EGGCONSOLE Burai: Jokan PC-8801mkIISR

70010000092630.description:
Welcome to a charming adventure platformer where love leads the way! Play as a bright-eyed heroine on a whimsical journey through magical lands, each sparkling with romance, mystery, and adventure.

Jump across heart-shaped platforms, solve adorable puzzles, and meet a cast of delightful characters—some might even be your perfect match! Explore dreamy villages, enchanted gardens, and starlit bridges as you follow your heart and uncover the magic of true love.

With colorful worlds, playful challenges, and a sweet story full of love and laughter, Valentine’s Venture is the perfect fairytale adventure for dreamers and romantics alike!
70010000092630.intro: Follow Your Heart, Find Your Love!
70010000092630.name: Valentine's Venture: True Love Odyssey

70010000092766.description: Little Paws: Kitty Cat Simulator is a relaxing and delightful adventure where players take control of adorable kitties traveling the world, exploring charming locations, and collecting fish from every corner of the globe. From bustling city streets to serene beaches and snowy mountaintops, each destination offers new challenges, hidden treasures, and playful interactions with other animals. With its cozy atmosphere, soothing gameplay, and endless opportunities for feline fun, this game is perfect for cat lovers and casual gamers alike!
70010000092766.intro: Tiny Paws, Big Adventures – Explore, Play, Relax!
70010000092766.name: Little Paws: Kitty Cat Simulator

70010000093465.description:
Step into the enchanting world of Distant Woods, a relaxing walking simulator where exploration meets tranquility. Wander through magical forests, uncover hidden wonders, and lose yourself in the calming beauty of nature. With no rush or pressure, it’s a perfect way to unwind and explore at your own pace.

Features:
Two Unique Levels: Discover different enchanting environments, each with distinct locations to explore.
Relaxing Gameplay: No stress—just pure exploration.
Beautiful Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in the peaceful sounds and sights of the forest.
70010000093465.name: Distant Woods

70050000054459.description:
Placid Plastic Duck - Rooftop One Percent brings you and the ducks to the first office designed exclusively for your relaxation!

What you'll find:

- 1 refined rooftop location

- a precise reconstruction of turbolento's actual office

- more than the usual 3 special ducks

- increased chilling thanks to a simpler design

- support for further development

- the ducks' gratitude

- a pigeon
70050000054459.intro: Placid Plastic Duck - Rooftop One Percent brings you and the ducks to the first office designed exclusively for your relaxation!
70050000054459.name: Placid Plastic Duck - Rooftop One Percent

70050000054523.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: Parallel Siblings”! Clear the story to add Castile the Chroma and Walnut from Phantom Brave to your party!
70050000054523.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: Parallel Siblings
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70050000055247.description: Discover an exciting new add-on for Little Strays, featuring four brand-new levels to explore! Uncover hidden spots where kittens are tucked away and help them by providing food and care.
70050000055247.name: New hideouts

70050000055352.description: Unlock 6 new designs for the plate set in your restaurant featuring various animals.
70050000055352.intro: Run the best restaurant in the middle of the city, complete orders, learn new recipes, and improve your cooking skills.
70050000055352.name: Animal Set
