70010000080262.description:
Enter the world of Everhood.
Discover the color of your soul and what lies beyond the river of death in a strange land. Accompany a mysterious celestial Raven who has deemed you worthy of slaying the Mind Dragon.

Features
-Master the music-based battles with over 100 songs!
-Voyage through a transcendental journey across 8-10 hours
-Enter a wild universe with mind-bending visuals
-Conquer the unconquerable
-Custom Battle Editor Support
-Make funny friends!
70010000080262.intro: AN UNCONVENTIONAL ARPG where you battle enemies through musical encounters through a strange and whimsical adventure.
70010000080262.name: Everhood 2

70050000055327.description:
Here is what Sprout Valley: Friends Forever expansion has to offer all farmers:

- 11 new friends that can be found while visiting new islands. Each of them has their own gift preferences, hobbies, unique style, and they’re all different kids of creatures - from buffalos to frogs!
- Each new islands dweller has a questline, at the end of which await new workspaces, items, and rewards.
- New boat colors and decorations to unlock.
- And new looks for containers like Nico’s chest, backpack, the mailbox, etc!
70050000055327.intro: These new fluffy friends will win over your heart!
70050000055327.name: Friends Forever

70070000026727.description:
Start a new journey and see how this is more than just a farming game.

ADORABLE CAT
Help cute cat Niko escape from the big city and settle with him on the Ostara archipelago. Just choose an island and start your new life! His knowledge and passion for nature will let you turn this island into the most stunning place on Earth. 

GAME ECONOMY
Your garden will produce many products you can sell and earn money. Remember to order unnecessary seeds, saplings and equipment to make your garden grow even bigger. Manage space on your island and pick the best place for your crops. Don’t forget to water them every day!

VARIOUS ACTIVITIES
It’s your choice what to do. Developing your skills by farming, mining, foraging, crafting, fishing will let you unlock new recipes and abilities. Make sure to unlock all of them and explore all possibilities in the game.

This bundle includes a total of 8 DLCs: Lovely, Easter, Cows, Summer, Nico's Skins, New Friend: Momo, Spray Paint, and the largest expansion ever created for Sprout Valley – Friends Forever.

KEY FEATURES
- Charming 2D pixel art graphics
- More than 20 hours of amazing gameplay
- Outfit customization
- Your own pets!
- Simple and clear economy system
- Lovely music track
70070000026727.intro: Make your dream of settling on an island and growing a beautiful garden come true!
70070000026727.name: Sprout Valley Friends Forever Expansion

70010000048821.description:
A hero's destiny is written in the Stars
The legendary Konami JRPGs Suikoden I and Suikoden II have now been remastered in HD!

The Story of Suikoden I
A once renowned hero turns into a violent tyrant, and an empire falls into decline.
A Liberation Army is rising up in an act of rebellion against an oppressive rule.
One by one the 108 stars of Destiny gather to shape the course of history.

The Story of Suikoden II
Our story's hero and his friend Jowy are members of the Unicorn Youth Brigade, which participated in a drawn-out border dispute between the Highland Kingdom and the City-States of Jowston .
A few months earlier, a truce agreement was signed between the two forces, both of which were happy to see an end to the fighting.
However, hidden under the momentary peace the fires of a new war continued to smolder…

Features of Suikoden I & Suikoden II HD
・All background illustrations have been upgraded to HD
・Updated effects breathe new life into the pixel art animation
・New environmental sounds effects to immerse yourself in this fantasy world
・Battle SFX are also now HD and add a new level of realism
・Newly added auto-save
・Battle Fast Forward
・Conversation Log
70010000048821.intro: The Legend of Suikoden I and II returns, remastered in HD!
70010000048821.name: Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars

70010000088597.description:
Takeshi Kuranari, an ordinary college student, visits the underwater theme park LeMU. An accident occurs, trapping Takeshi and 6 other individuals inside LeMU, 51 meters below the surface. With no hope of rescue, Takeshi explores LeMU along with the mysterious girl Tsugumi and part-time employee You, searching for a way to escape to the surface. 
A theme park of dreams and hopes sunk in the depths of the mysterious blue ocean.
Can dreams and hopes still be found there? Or is there some other mystery lurking?
Overcoming one crisis after another, they search for a way to escape!

A masterpiece written by Kotaro Uchikoshi comes to Nintendo Switch™, 22 years after the initial Japanese release!
70010000088597.intro: To the promise we once made and the place we must return
70010000088597.name: Ever 17 - The Out of Infinity

70010000088599.description:
The protagonist, Makoto Ishihara, had the worst possible awakening. He had a dream in which a girl died a tragic death right in front of his eyes. The seminar training camp was supposed to go off without a hitch...or so Makoto believed.
April 6th.. The day everything changed. 
The uneasiness turned in to despair, and the premonition turned into calamity...
Will Makoto be able to stop the tragedy and see the light of the morning on Day 7?

A classic Sci-fi visual novel written by Kotaro Uchikoshi comes to Nintendo Switch™ 24 years after the initial Japanese release!
70010000088599.intro: Save me from this cage of infinity
70010000088599.name: Never 7 - The End of Infinity

70010000090432.description:
Alruna is a dryad in a dying world – a spirit of life in the land of the dead. The earth is sucked dry. There is only The Sprawl. Poor, bedraggled skele-men dot the Wasteland of the Necro-Industrialists and shuffle endlessly back and forth in a toiling mockery of life. But are they the real enemy? Or do the skeletons suffer just as much as the dryads under the domination of the Necro-Industrialists?

And salvation? Is it possible? Dead men yearn for Heaven. But the dead can only dig...
70010000090432.intro: The heart that beats, beats brutally
70010000090432.name: Alruna and the Necro-Industrialists

70010000091721.description:
There are different types of races and now you can try a completely new and unusual sport. Jump on the trampolines and bounce higher and higher! 

Choose the exact moment to land and the steepest springboard to jump as high as possible and find out what is hidden behind the clouds.  

Each course has several levels, and the higher you can climb, the more valuable and interesting the prizes will be! 

Win all the races, collect all the bonuses and unlock all the funky skins for your hero. Have fun with crazy jumps and heights you can reach.    

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Take part in the funniest race ever!
70010000091721.intro: Jump high. Run fast. Win the race!
70010000091721.name: Jump Race

70010000091969.description:
Cyber Quest is a retro deck building game. Assemble a ragtag crew of hackers, mercenaries, and street-savvy rogues to take on the most feared crime gangs in the city. Each encounter is a high-stakes battle of wits and tactics as you pit your crew against rival factions in this intense card-based rpg.

- Collect and customize an arsenal of powerful cards. Build your deck to exploit enemy weaknesses, unleash devastating combos, and outmaneuver your foes.
- Level up your crew members, unlock new powers, and transform your team into an unstoppable force.
- Roguelike gamplay. Explore the sprawling cityscape, face randomized challenges, and adapt to new foes.
- Enhance your cards by changing their cost, damage, or color. Tailor your deck to suit your strategy.
- Groove to the finest fusion of funk and electronic music.
- Enjoying playing offline games? No connect required here. Play anywhere, anytime.
70010000091969.intro: A retro deck building game. Assemble a ragtag crew of hackers, mercenaries, and street-savvy rogues to take on the most feared crime gangs
70010000091969.name: Cyber Quest

70050000051067.description:
Pre-Order Bonus: 
Below are the benefits given to players that purchase Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars at an early time.
- 57300 potch
- Fortune Orb x1
- Prosperity Orb x1

Players can choose whether to start the game with the "DLC pack (57,300 potch / Fortune Orb / Prosperity Orb)" in your possession at the beginning of the "NEWGAME" for both Suikoden I and II
*potch: in-game currency
*Fortune Orb: Doubles the experience gained by the character that bears it
*Prosperity Orb: Doubles the "potch" gained when winning a battle with the character that bears it
*Suikoden I's MC cannot bear both runes
70050000051067.name: Special Item Pack (Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Pre-Order Bonus)

70050000055234.description: Find out what happened to Treflixy and Spy Guy during a walk on the beach in a charming comic book that will get you better acquainted with your favorite characters.
70050000055234.intro: A comic book of Treflix adventures with a funny story of how to deal with anger!
70050000055234.name: Treflix: Comic Book Anger

70050000055467.description: Far, far away in a galaxy far, far away, Spy Guy has gone on a journey to track down the missing parts of a spaceship. The cosmos is full of all sorts of items, but will he find what he needs. Discover a brand new 120 levels of the iconic Spy Guy game this time in space!
70050000055467.intro: Spy Guy escapes into Space and searches for hidden objects between planets!
70050000055467.name: Spy Guy Cosmos

70070000025662.description:
Two classic visual novels written by Kotaro Uchikoshi make their way to the West after over 2 decades of initial Japanese release! Enjoy the science fiction, mystery and love stories in Ever 17/Never 7 Double Pack!

Ever 17 - The Out of Infinity
Takeshi Kuranari, an ordinary college student, visits the underwater theme park LeMU. An accident occurs, trapping Takeshi and 6 other individuals inside LeMU, 51 meters below the surface. With no hope of rescue, Takeshi explores LeMU along with the mysterious girl Tsugumi and part-time employee You, searching for a way to escape to the surface. 
A theme park of dreams and hopes sunk in the depths of the mysterious blue ocean.
Can dreams and hopes still be found there? Or is there some other mystery lurking?
Overcoming one crisis after another, they search for a way to escape!

Never 7 - The End of Infinity
The protagonist, Makoto Ishihara, had the worst possible awakening. He had a dream in which a girl died a tragic death right in front of his eyes. The seminar training camp was supposed to go off without a hitch...or so Makoto believed.
April 6th.. The day everything changed. 
The uneasiness turned in to despair, and the premonition turned into calamity...
Will Makoto be able to stop the tragedy and see the light of the morning on Day 7?
70070000025662.intro: Stand up to the fate of infinity!
70070000025662.name: Ever 17/Never 7 Double Pack

70010000076071.description:
Boot up for a byte-sized adventure in MainFrames, a clever and charming platformer that plays out entirely within the windows and desktop of a PC monitor.

Join Floppy, an adventurous program seeking to find their place in the digital world, while cheeky daemons maintain the system’s balance, always managing to stay out of your sight. Navigate a maze of diverse PC frames, meet quirky and colorful characters, and uncover secrets that bring Floppy closer to piecing together their function. Each interaction injects humor and warmth into their journey, making every moment a byte of delight.

In MainFrames, you'll guide Floppy by rearranging program windows to create new pathways, jumping between frames to navigate the digital world. Every area you explore is rich with distinct visual styles, innovative mechanics, and hidden secrets. Complemented by a chill lo-fi soundtrack, the game’s charming puzzles and platforming challenges provide a rewarding experience that's hard to log off from.

MainFrames will keep you logged in for a short and sweet journey, ensuring that you won't want to press the escape key on this enchanting adventure. Each level is an upgrade you won't want to miss. Get ready to dive into an unforgettable digital quest!
70010000076071.intro: MainFrames invites you to meet Floppy and to browse a clever and charming platformer. You won’t want to press the escape key on this cozy outing!
70010000076071.name: MainFrames

70010000082262.description: Explore millions of hero build possibilities with 800+ items and 30+ random modifiers. Experience a deep sense of progression over 50+ hours of gameplay by scoring top-quality loot.
70010000082262.intro: 3D rogue-like action game in dark fantasy. Blow up thousands of nasties and grab epic loot to power up your heroes for tougher challenges.
70010000082262.name: Malignant Survivors

70010000088178.description:
On the run!

Mika Amamine, visits Rome to celebrate the end of exams only for her trip to turn upside down when she witnesses a murder and is arrested as a suspect. During transport, the police van overturns in an accident, freeing her and six other criminals, becoming fugitives.

Mysterious attackers appear, targeting her unique ability, and begin to pursue the group. Will the team unravel the clues and reclaim their normal lives?
70010000088178.name: Despera Drops

70010000088773.description:
Enter the captivating world of Dark Passion - Anime Match Puzzles! This thrilling game combines the challenge of tile matching with the beauty of anime-inspired artwork.

Match tiles to unveil breathtaking images and immerse yourself in a dark yet enchanting atmosphere. With multiple levels, adjustable difficulties, and mesmerizing visuals, the game offers an experience perfect for both casual players and puzzle enthusiasts.
Discover the passion, embrace the mystery, and let the stunning anime art guide your journey!
70010000088773.intro: Discover Dark Passion - Anime Match Puzzles! Match tiles to reveal stunning anime art and immerse yourself in mystery.
70010000088773.name: Dark Passion - Anime Match Puzzles

70010000090175.description:
Welcome to the high-stakes world of armored cash transportation! In Cash Guardian: Collector Operation "Capital Defense," you take on the thrilling and dangerous role of an armored car collector. Your mission: transport vast sums of money, gold, and precious valuables across the bustling metropolis, protecting them from robbers and unforeseen threats.
Features:
- Intense Armored Car Simulation: Experience the heart-pounding action of real-life cash collection. Navigate city streets, overcome obstacles, and make split-second decisions to ensure your cargo's safety.
- 100 Diverse Missions: Challenge yourself with a massive campaign featuring over 100 unique missions. Each mission offers varying difficulty levels, routes, and objectives, keeping the gameplay fresh and exciting.
- Choose Your Collector: Select from six unique playable characters, each with their own look and personality. Find the collector that best suits your playstyle!
- Weaponized Defense: Master a variety of defensive tools and weaponry to deter and eliminate any threat to your precious cargo. From tactical maneuvers to powerful firearms, be prepared for anything.
- Test Your Skills: Every mission pushes your skills to the limit. Develop your courage, caution, and resourcefulness to survive as a master of capital defense.
- Dynamic City Environment: Navigate a living, breathing metropolis filled with traffic, pedestrians, and potential dangers. Stay alert and adapt your tactics to the ever-changing city environment.
Can you overcome the challenges and emerge a true master of capital protection?
70010000090175.intro: Defend your cash, outsmart the heist!
70010000090175.name: Cash Guardian: Collector Operation "Capital Defense"

70010000090348.description:
In this interactive game experience, you step into the role of a small bird, soaring through breathtaking landscapes while collecting magical crystals that mark certain locations. The game is not about defeating enemies or overcoming dangerous obstacles, but rather about immersing yourself in a peaceful and tranquil environment. It is designed to relax your mind and soul, providing a soothing escape from the stresses of everyday life.
With no threats or enemies to worry about, you can fully focus on enjoying the beauty of the world around you and the sensation of flying freely. The game aims to give you a sense of liberation and lightness, offering the perfect retreat to unwind after a busy day and leave behind the rush of the outside world.
One of the unique features of this game is that you can select the level that best suits your desire to relax. The levels are designed to be completed quickly, so you can enjoy a short break if you're looking for a brief moment of peace. However, if you have more time and wish to explore, you can take a slower pace and dive deeper into the environment. This flexibility allows you to choose the experience that fits your needs, whether it's a short moment of calm or a longer, more immersive journey.
The game showcases a beautiful collection of some of the most stunning landscapes from the Aery franchise. These carefully crafted sceneries offer a visual oasis of tranquillity, ranging from majestic mountains and vast forests to peaceful lakes and endless skies. Each scene is designed not only to delight the eyes but also to create an atmosphere of calm that invites you to relax.
We hope you enjoy the beautiful landscapes and that they help you unwind and find peace. So, sit back, take a deep breath, and let the magic of this world carry you away. It’s an invitation to give yourself a break and fully experience the present moment.
70010000090348.intro: Escape the daily hustle, feel the freedom of flying, and immerse yourself in beautiful, peaceful landscapes
70010000090348.name: Aery - Dream Land

70010000091526.description:
A trip to the Dino Park may sound awesome…
…and it is…
…but what if that trip was also full of cats to find and pet?
If you have a penchant for seeking cats… the Dino Park would be thankful for your help with spotting them all! ^^

Game features:
- 500 cats to find (and little extra details, too!)
- A bunch of special cats to collect!
- Five levels, dense with friendly-looking, handmade drawings!
- Three adorable music tracks to make your game nice and cosy!
- Adjustable game colours, brightness, and contrast!
70010000091526.intro: Take a stroll to the Dino Park – among the dinosaurs, there’s a lot of cats!
70010000091526.name: Cats and Seek : Dino Park

70010000092286.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Gangneung-si, Korea with "Real" footage! 
This work takes place in Gangneung-si, Samcheok-si, etc. 
There are a total of 11 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to 11 locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Gangneung-si, Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000092286.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000092286.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Gangneung City

70050000054525.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: The Wandering Pirate”! Clear the story to add Samayoi, the Wanderer from BAR Stella Abyss to your party!
70050000054525.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: The Wandering Pirate
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70050000054526.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: The Liar and the Lost”! Clear the story to add the Liar Princess from The Liar Princess and the Blind Prince to your party!
70050000054526.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: The Liar and the Lost
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70010000084324.description:
Take care of your animals and your farm, sell your goods to the cute Forest Folk, upgrade your farm, and fulfill small orders from the Harmony Tree to fill the tiny island with life again. If you wish, you can go on dates with friendly locals, each with their own unique personality and backstory!

We keep it accessible so that even parents can let their kids explore the island worry-free. There’s no rush, no stress—just a peaceful environment filled with charming animals, farm life, and a beautiful island to discover.

• Run your own cozy farm shop and sell goods
• Care for animals and build bonds
• Grow crops and gather resources
• Complete Harmony Tree quests to restore the island
• Befriend or date friendly locals, each with their own unique personality
• Relaxing, pressure-free gameplay with no time limits
• Also designed for short, enjoyable play sessions
70010000084324.intro: Run your own farm shop, without any pressure!
70010000084324.name: Sugardew Island

70010000091936.description:
Gearheads, buckle up! Mechanic Supermarket Simulator throws you headfirst into the exciting world of automotive retail. Here, you’ll call the shots, crafting a one-stop shop for car enthusiasts and building a thriving automotive empire.

Features:
- Build Your Dream Auto Oasis: Design your ideal car care haven. Customize the layout, stock shelves with everything from everyday maintenance supplies to high-performance upgrades, and become the ultimate inventory master – predict customer demand, keep shelves full, and avoid stockouts.
- Expand Your Automotive Empire: Start small and grow your reputation! Watch your local parts store blossom into a regional powerhouse, attracting customers with an ever-expanding selection of parts and the latest automotive technology.
- Unlock New Parts & Licenses: Stay ahead of the curve by offering the latest innovations in the industry. Secure licenses for cutting-edge parts, from hybrid engine components to autonomous vehicle systems.
- Master the Marketplace: Become a retail shark! Adapt your pricing strategies to stay competitive, respond to changing customer demands, and keep your customers happy with excellent service that caters to every need, from routine maintenance to complex repairs.

Mechanic Supermarket Simulator offers a unique blend of business simulation and car customization, putting you in the driver’s seat of your automotive retail destiny. Are you ready to build a one-stop shop that keeps every engine purring?
70010000091936.intro: Master the art of repairs and build a mechanical empire!
70010000091936.name: Mechanic Supermarket Simulator

70010000080343.description:
Arise from the abyss of death to reclaim your rightful throne in a captivating action platformer. Assume the mantle of the 'Cursed King,' wielding the chains that once imprisoned you, now transformed into formidable weapons to vanquish your enemies and navigate the perilous terrain of your shattered kingdom. Discover hidden areas, solve puzzles, and uncover secret treasures to feed your power as you prepare for epic battles against gruelling, colossal bosses. Level up strategically to overcome all who stand in your way and take your seat as the rightful king once more!

Arise From The Dead & Claim Back Your Throne!
Assume the mantle of the ‘Cursed King’ as you embark on a relentless journey of vengeance to reclaim your stolen throne. Traverse perilous lands fraught with danger as you hunt for the scattered fragments of celestial arrows, combining them to purge your curse and unlock your true power.

Wield The Chains That Once Imprisoned You!
Embrace your newfound strength and command over the chains that once bound you deep within the crypts. Harness this mighty weapon to repel, slash, and eviscerate any who dare obstruct your path. Utilise your chains further for navigation, attaching to rings and propelling across chasms to reach new areas.

Discover Hidden Areas & Reclaim Your Kingdom’s Treasures
Explore every inch of your crumbling kingdom, uncovering hidden chambers and clandestine passages teeming with invaluable treasures. Acquire newfound abilities and enhancements as you delve deeper, fortifying yourself for the trials that await.

Collect Crystals & Items To Feed Your Power!
Uncover elusive ""power crystals"" and harness their essence to strategically enhance your abilities, gaining an edge on the looming challenges ahead.

Banish Colossal Demons From Your Lands!
Test your strategic finesse and precise timing in intense battles that demand skilful manoeuvring to overcome gruelling, gigantic bosses. 

A Classic Is Revived! Beyond The Ice Palace Returns!
Witness the triumphant resurrection of a cult classic over 35 years in the making!
70010000080343.intro: Wield the chains that once imprisoned you!
70010000080343.name: Beyond the Ice Palace 2

70010000089974.description:
A Collapsing Empire
During Chongzhen’s Reign (A.D. 1628-1644), land annexation reached unmitigated extremes, the country faced domestic issues and foreign invasions, coinciding with the catastrophic Little Ice Age. After many years of horrid disasters in succession one after another, the Ming court continued to impose inhumane policies resulting in widespread starvation and leading to the rise of multiple rebellions against the court.

A Travelling With Desperados
Liang the bandit, and his companion are commissioned for a job from an unsavory merchant and must escort four girls to a wealthy lord in the city of Luoyang. They must pass through Huazhou, Wenxiang, Shanzhou, and finally reach their destination of Luoyang.
Liang initially believes that the girls he is escorting will be sold to the wealthy lord as adopted daughters to begin a new life. However, one of the four girls named “Sui” reveals the hidden secret of their journey to Luoyang.
The lord is a swine demon who has practiced devouring young ladies for over a thousand years. Every year on his birthday, he dispatches human traffickers to abduct girls from Shan in celebration of his special day. Sui’s sister was among the many who have fallen victim to the demon’s appetite.
Sui is hopeful that Liang will end the escort and join her in assassinating the swine demon to avenge her sister, and those who have perished in recent years. Although Liang wants to believe Sui, there are too many inconsistencies in her story. Throughout the journey, Liang will gather information, unravel the truth, and make his decisions accordingly.
70010000089974.intro: Trek across ancient China in a dark, boundary-pushing visual novel inspired by traditional Chinese art with modern animation.
70010000089974.name: The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty

70010000091716.description:
Have you ever wondered how terrifying snails are? They stalk their prey slowly but mercilessly. You can't hide from them. They'll find you anywhere. Even years from now. 

Eat these little people and grow. Grow and eat more. They're just your food. No pity. They are a slow instrument of death!  

Or would you like to try your hand at being a human and attacking these evil slugs? At first you will have to escape, but gradually you will be able to attack these monsters and clear the levels. Everything in this world is unpredictable. Pick a side in this eternal conflict and win!       

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Choose your side in this epic confrontation!
70010000091716.intro: Let the battle between snails and humans begin!
70010000091716.name: Snails vs Humans

70010000082008.description:
An all-new installment!
Leap into your kart and jump into the fastest poultry race of all time. This ultimate championship title chase offers you a brand new racing experience,  with improved driving physics, revised cartoon graphics and head-over-wheels loops, alongside crossplay and online multiplayer too.

Full speed, awesome action!
•  Criss-cross and drive head-over-heels through the Crazy Chicken universe: discover 12 adventurous tracks with unique challenges and hidden shortcuts.
• Configure your karts and use all kinds of tricks to gain the upper hand over your opponents! Choose from 12 new and revised items, such as the tried and tested 16 ton weight.
• Compete against crazy chickens and other well-known characters to prove you're the fastest driver around. There's even a new character - Midnight, the friendly bat.
• Now with cross-platform online multiplayer for up to 8 players, letting you connect with your friends, or find new rivals from the community.
• Local multiplayer:  play with up to 4 players on a single screen and experience the racing spectacle together.
• Single player and Grand Prix modes against AI opponents.
70010000082008.intro: The world's craziest chicken is heading back to the racetrack!  Wacky characters, cool tracks and karts, and zany items await in a worldwide online battle for first place!
70010000082008.name: Moorhuhn Kart 4

70010000085966.description:
A new iteration of a long beloved cross-dressing series boasting 10+ years makes its Nintendo Switch™ debut!
Witness the most gorgeous cross-dressing girl's love story ever made in thoroughly animated glory!

[Story]
Our story takes place in a private school known as Ayanohara Academy.

A secluded flower garden where affluent young gentlemen dress and act as ladies to become "he-iresses", form sisterly bonds with one another, and allow their quasi-romantic relationships to flourish...
New transfer student Iori however, our non-affluent background having protagonist, rejects these ways in an effort to stay true to himself, then quickly finds himself at odds with Mikage, the tyrannical student council president and cross-dressing purist.
The strong willed rebel Iori, and the zealous cross-dressing loyalist Mikage. Their fateful meeting soon unleashes upon them a new forbidden world of cross-dressing girl's love!

[Characters]
-Iori Kido CV: Yuika
The Protagonist surprised by how well women's clothes suit him. Referred to by some students as "The Goddess of Black Camellia", he stumbles into becoming the beautiful envy of his peers.

-Mikage Ayanohara CV:Ren Sagami
The elegant looking yet black-hearted wealthy he-iress. A powerful presence even among the many affluent students around her, she is a member of the elite family that owns the school. Her beauty and elegance as a cross-dressing he-iress earned her the second name, "The White Lily Fairy".
*The main heroine of this game!

-Reona Murasaki CV:Kagome Shiotani
Due to his refined appearance, charisma, and noble background, he is specially permitted to play a male prince-like role at the school. Having quickly become close friends with Iori, he looks out for him and helps him out in every way he can.

-Mahiro Senjuin CV: Ryouko Tezuka
The delinquent gyaru he-iress who rejects the established traditions of her strict buttoned-up family. Doesn't particularly want to dress as a woman, so she chooses to dress as a delinquent one as a form of passive protest.

-Asuka Senjuin CV: Suzuna
The gorgeous he-iress in ringlets. Referred to as "Empress of the Rose Garden", her immense pride in her own family lineage frequently becomes a point of contention between her and Mikage.

-Shizuka Kiriyama CV: Marina Ohno
Iori and Reona's childlike homeroom teacher. She is highly popular among students for her extremely cute un-teacher-like appearance and utterances.
70010000085966.intro:
Cute girls (male) in motion at long last!
A girl's love visual novel game with a cross-dressing twist made to shatter the reader's current worldview to pieces.
70010000085966.name: Trap Yuri Garden

70010000091590.description:
One fateful day, without any warning, the labyrinthine city of Orario was transformed.
In the sunken Orario, Bell and his group follow the trail of the characters as dictated in the heroic tale.
What they find there are an abundance of thoughts and feelings not depicted in "Fullland of Water and Light".

A story tracing the hero's trials and truth now unfolds...

Control Bell Cranel or Ais Wallenstein in this side-scrolling RPG, defeating monsters and advancing through stages to complete the story!
70010000091590.intro: A story tracing the hero's trials and truth now unfolds...
70010000091590.name:
Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
~Fullland of Water and Light~

70010000092084.description:
Step into the world of Wine Factory Simulator, where passion meets precision, and every bottle tells a story. Immerse yourself in the tranquil yet rewarding life of a home winemaker, transforming simple grapes into exquisite wines that captivate connoisseurs.
Start your journey by cultivating your own vineyard, carefully selecting grape varieties that will define the character of your wines. Tend to your vines, ensuring they receive just the right balance of sunlight, water, and care. A thriving vineyard is the heart of a great winery!
As the seasons change and the grapes reach perfection, it’s time to harvest and begin the winemaking process. Crush the fruit, initiate fermentation, and patiently oversee every stage of aging, refining the flavor profile to perfection. Your expertise will determine whether your wine becomes a forgettable drink or a sought-after masterpiece.
But winemaking is more than just production—it’s about sharing your passion with the world. Open your winery’s doors, welcome guests, and establish your reputation as a true artisan. Experiment with new grape blends, refine your techniques, and watch as your small, cozy winery transforms into a renowned destination for wine lovers.

Features:
Grape Variety Selection – Choose from a range of grape types, each with unique flavors and qualities.
Vineyard Management – Use tools and machinery to care for your vineyard and ensure the highest quality harvest.
Hands-On Winemaking – Crush, ferment, age, and refine your wines with precision and care.
Sell and Expand – Bottle your creations, sell them to customers, and invest in growing your winery.
Experiment & Innovate – Discover new techniques, refine your recipes, and craft the perfect wine.

Are you ready to build your own winemaking empire? Pour your heart into every bottle and create a legacy that will stand the test of time in Wine Factory Simulator!
70010000092084.intro: Grow, Harvest, Create – The Art of Winemaking Awaits!
70010000092084.name: Wine Factory Simulator

70010000093569.description:
Cashier Simulator: Manage Your Own Market!
Are you ready to dive into the world of retail and manage your own grocery store? With Cashier Simulator, you can create, expand, and lead your dream market to ultimate success! From stocking shelves with the best products to managing checkout lines, every decision is in your hands. Can you build the best grocery store in town?

Build and Expand:
Start with a small, humble market and transform it into a bustling grocery store empire. Buy new shelves, hire employees, and expand your floor space to accommodate more products and customers.

Customer Satisfaction:
Keep your customers happy by ensuring your shelves are always stocked, your prices are competitive, and your service is top-notch. Handle customer complaints, manage queues, and make sure everyone leaves with a smile.

Product Management:
Choose from a wide variety of products to keep your shelves full. From fresh produce to household items, ensure you have what your customers need. Monitor sales trends and adjust your inventory to maximize profits.

Upgrade and Customize:
Upgrade your equipment and customize your store to make it stand out. Invest in better checkout counters, faster restocking shelves, and even decorate your market with unique themes to attract more customers.

Daily Challenges and Rewards:
Complete daily challenges to earn rewards and improve your market. Special events and seasonal sales offer unique opportunities to boost your revenue and customer satisfaction.

Realistic Simulation:
Experience a realistic supermarket environment with detailed graphics and dynamic gameplay. Manage everything from employee schedules to special promotions and seasonal sales.

Strategic Decisions:
Make strategic decisions to optimize your market’s performance. Decide on pricing strategies, marketing campaigns, and even how to handle competitors.

Why You'll Love Cashier Simulator:
Cashier Simulator offers an engaging and immersive experience that allows you to build and manage your own grocery store. Whether you enjoy strategy games, management simulations, or simply love the idea of running a store, this game offers endless fun and challenges. With its realistic mechanics, detailed graphics, and a wide range of customization options, Cashier Simulator is the ultimate retail management game.
70010000093569.name: Cashier Simulator

70050000054527.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: The Girl Who Cried Ghost”! Clear the story to add the Girl (Kotomo) from Yomawari: Night Alone to your party!
70050000054527.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: The Girl Who Cried Ghost
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70050000054528.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: The Rat Who Demons Fear”! Clear the story to add Mad Rat & Heart from Mad Rat Dead to your party!
70050000054528.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: The Rat Who Demons Fear
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70070000025713.description:
This edition of MLB The Show 25 Includes: 
 • 20 The Show Packs
 • 5 Gold Choice Packs
 • 1 20th Anniversary Choice Pack 
 • 1 Diamond Choice Pack
 • 1 Equipment Pack
 • 1 Double Daily Rewards
 • 1 Cover Athlete Bat Skin
 • 20,000 Stubs™

Ignite your passion and build your very own path to greatness—from high school all the way to the Hall of Fame! Along the way, connect with iconic baseball stars in fan-favorite modes – updated with new ways to play.

Road to The Show: 
 • Begin your RTTS journey by playing High School and College games in The Amateur Years.
 • Build the RTTS ballplayer you want, the way you want to. You’re free to edit perks and benefit from revamped Attributes.
 
 Franchise & March to October: 
 • Enjoy every moment of every game – or choose the key moments that matter, now with improvements to both Trade Logic and Defensive WAR. 
 
 Diamond Dynasty
 • Collect and earn player cards in Diamond Dynasty: 360, as you craft your very own lineup – with no more time-limited season restrictions. 
 • Try out Diamond Quest with your squad! It’s a brand-new roguelike game mode, where rewards are yours to earn through moments, boss encounters and more.
 
 Gameplay Improvements and Expansion:
 • Experience exciting new gameplay in all modes: featuring a variety of all-new RTTS Impact Plays, G.O.A.T difficulty for the ultimate challenge, all-new Ambush Hitting for a more realistic “plan of attack” at the plate, faster online gameplay and hundreds of new animations for extreme realism – and much more!
 
 Storylines: 
 • Celebrate history in Storylines while you learn about baseball legends and their amazing tales. 
 
 The Best Gets Better: 
 • Hear authentic High School and College audio—including metal bats and chain link fences—alongside enhanced stadium sound and fan chants, all powered by ShowTech™.
70070000025713.intro: Forge your baseball journey in The Show™
70070000025713.name: MLB® The Show™ 25 - Digital Deluxe Edition

70010000093622.description:
Tiny Lands - Deluxe Edition is a relaxing 3D game about finding the differences between two handcrafted dioramas. If you are looking for a game that allows you to just sit back and play Tiny Lands is for you!

Tiny Lands - Deluxe Edition includes all DLC worlds:
-	Desert mysteries
-	City lifestyle
-	Warmly Christmas
-	Traditional food
-	Cozy interiors
-	Fairy tales
-	Fish tanks
-	Amusement park
-	Pirates

This also includes the “Final Challenge” special world for those who are ready for the ultimate Tiny Lands experience.

Over 100 additional handcrafted dioramas are waiting for you!
70010000093622.intro: Relax and find the differences in beautiful 3D dioramas. With the Deluxe Edition, you can play all the new expansions for Tiny Lands.
70010000093622.name: Tiny Lands - Deluxe Edition

70010000082775.description:
This edition of MLB The Show 25 includes:
 • 5 The Show Packs

Ignite your passion and build your very own path to greatness—from high school all the way to the Hall of Fame! Along the way, connect with iconic baseball stars in fan-favorite modes – updated with new ways to play.

Road to The Show: 
 • Begin your RTTS journey by playing High School and College games in The Amateur Years.
 • Build the RTTS ballplayer you want, the way you want to. You’re free to edit perks and benefit from revamped Attributes.
 
 Franchise & March to October: 
 • Enjoy every moment of every game – or choose the key moments that matter, now with improvements to both Trade Logic and Defensive WAR. 
 
 Diamond Dynasty
 • Collect and earn player cards in Diamond Dynasty: 360, as you craft your very own lineup – with no more time-limited season restrictions. 
 • Try out Diamond Quest with your squad! It’s a brand-new roguelike game mode, where rewards are yours to earn through moments, boss encounters and more.
 
 Gameplay Improvements and Expansion:
 • Experience exciting new gameplay in all modes: featuring a variety of all-new RTTS Impact Plays, G.O.A.T difficulty for the ultimate challenge, all-new Ambush Hitting for a more realistic “plan of attack” at the plate, faster online gameplay and hundreds of new animations for extreme realism – and much more!
 
 Storylines:

 The Best Gets Better:

If you are interested in Early Access and playing 4 days early on March 14th 2025, do not purchase this version and instead purchase the Digital Deluxe Edition.
70010000082775.intro: Forge your baseball journey in The Show™
70010000082775.name: MLB® The Show™ 25

70050000053208.description: This bonus content for MLB The Show 25 includes 15 The Show Packs, 5 Gold Choice Packs, 1 20th Anniversary Choice Pack, 1 Diamond Choice Pack, 1 Equipment Pack, 1 Cover Athlete Bat Skin, 20,000 Stubs™, and Double Daily Rewards. Once acquired, items should be redeemed upon booting the game.
70050000053208.intro: Forge your baseball journey in The Show™
70050000053208.name: Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus Content

70010000088833.description:
Fight for survival while exploring the vast expanses of an alien world in Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition. This visually enhanced version of the epic sci-fi RPG features additional content – including new story elements.

The year is 2054. Earth has been destroyed by an intergalactic war between two alien races, and humanity is on the brink of annihilation. A small number of survivors, aboard the USS White Whale, crash land on the vast and untamed planet Mira – and now it falls to you, as a member of BLADE, to help bring humanity back from the edge of extinction.

Early purchase bonus: Exploration Support Pack*

Includes the following in-game items:

100,000 credits

Melee weapon: Advanced Iron Knife

Ranged weapon: Advanced Storm Assault Rifle

Survival armor series: Survival Goggles, Survival Bodywear, Survival Glove R, Survival Glove L, Survival Footwear

Six weapon augments: Melee Accuracy Up I,  Ranged Accuracy Up I, Melee Attack Up I,  Ranged Attack Up I, Theroid Slayer I, Secondary CD Reducer I

Five armor augments: Max HP Up I, Max TP Up I, Evasion Up I, Potential Up I, Physical Resistance Up I

*The Exploration Support Pack bonus will be granted automatically to those who purchase the game from Nintendo eShop before April 6th, 2025, or redeem the download code included in the physical version at launch. An internet connection is required to receive the bonus. The Exploration Support Pack can be obtained from the Customization Center, available from Chapter 3 onwards. Items listed above can also be obtained in-game.
70010000088833.intro: This is where we build our future
70010000088833.name: Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition

70010000091090.description:
EXPLORE THE MANSION
You find yourself trapped inside the mysterious Mystwood Mansion. The door behind you is locked and the only way forward is to delve deeper into the mansion. As you explore the mansion's many rooms you discover that someone has orchestrated a series of puzzles and challenges to keep you from escaping.

SOLVE PUZZLES AND DECIPHER CODES
Each room of the mansion is filled with puzzles to solve and codes to decipher. As you take on the mansion's many challenges someone seems to be watching your every move...

INTERACT WITH THE ENVIRONMENT
Poke around to find clues to help you solve the puzzles. Interact and study 3D objects to find important details.

ESCAPE!
Will you escape the mansion's grasp or are you up to the challenge to access the final room?

FEATURES
• Five puzzle-filled rooms with hidden sub-areas
• Dynamic hint system
• Beautiful and immersive environments to explore
• Many objects and secrets to find
• Multiple endings
70010000091090.intro: Experience a first-person escape room adventure in the mysterious Mystwood mansion. Solve puzzles, crack codes, and uncover hidden secrets to escape!
70010000091090.name: Escape From Mystwood Mansion

70010000091711.description:
Learn to use the boomerang - one of the best and most unique weapons available. Feel the awesome experience and use it for your victories! 

Throw the boomerang at your enemies, trying to choose the best trajectory and speed to cause the most damage. You will see just how dangerous this weapon can be.      

Complete all the levels with this wonderful tool of war and become the most skilled boomerang warrior in the world. Just throw it again and again. It will return to its master each time.  

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Feel the way our ancestors fought!
70010000091711.intro: Try one of the oldest weapons in the world.
70010000091711.name: Boomerang of Destruction

70010000085992.description:
People gather memories as they live their lives, thus developing their souls. This is the story of a young woman traveling across a ruined continent to find the path toward the future.

The theme of this game is "memory." There are moments when everyone must confront the past and their own memories. All memories, including both successes and failures, become nourishment for the future and help shape people. "Atelier Yumia" tells the story of Yumia and her companions as they follow the path they believe in while being confronted by the memories they discover along the way.

Story:
In a world where alchemy is deemed "taboo," the alchemist Yumia yearns for the truth the lies hidden in a ruined continent. The time has come for her to take the first step on her grand adventure across the continent.

Main features:
- Freely traverse the vast open field in all directions
The continent is an unexplored land where the player can use a wide range of items and actions to forge their path forward.

- Game cycle
Explore the field and gather ingredients in order to synthesize items. The items you create are key to advancing the story and can be used for combat and further exploration. You can also use "Simple Synthesis" to create items while you are out in the field and construct bases using the "Building" feature.

- Create items while out in the field and customize bases however you like!
You can use Simple Synthesis to create exploration tools for opening the path forward, as well as items that will benefit you during combat and synthesis. You can also use the Building feature to construct bases and then decorate them with furniture to your liking.

Note: Please check the official "Atelier Yumia" site for details. Please be aware that other editions containing this product exist. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
70010000085992.intro: Walk the forbidden path, no matter where it leads.
70010000085992.name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence, coarse language and sexualised imagery

70050000054165.description:
Includes poses and frames which can be used in photo mode.

List of Contents:
- Five photo poses
- Three photo frames

Note: This content may become available for purchase or for free separately at a later date. Photo mode is available after base building has been unlocked. Please check the official "Atelier Yumia" site for details.
70050000054165.intro: Enjoy photo mode even more with additional poses and frames!
70050000054165.name: Atelier Yumia - Limited Photo Poses and Frames
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence, coarse language and sexualised imagery

70050000054167.description:
Adds the "Athlete of Memories" costume for Yumia.

Note: This content may become available for purchase or for free separately at a later date. Costumes are available after unlocking base building and placing a Dressing Room. This costume is included in the "Atelier Yumia - Aladiss Investigation Preparation Set." Please check the official "Atelier Yumia" site for details.
70050000054167.intro: Run around the open field with this sportswear!
70050000054167.name: "Athlete of Memories" Costume for Yumia
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence, coarse language and sexualised imagery

70050000054169.description:
Adds the "Floating Object of Memories" costume for Flammi.

Note: This content may become available for purchase or for free separately at a later date. Costumes are available after unlocking base building and placing a Dressing Room. This costume is included in the "Atelier Yumia - Aladiss Investigation Preparation Set." Please check the official "Atelier Yumia" site for details.
70050000054169.intro: Flammi cheers on Yumia while wearing a headband!
70050000054169.name: "Floating Object of Memories" Costume for Flammi
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence, coarse language and sexualised imagery

70050000054171.description:
Includes three "Training Wrist Weight" accessories and the recipe for Training Wrist Weights. Training Wrist Weights increase the experience gained from defeating monsters by 3% while equipped.

Note: This content may become available for purchase or for free separately at a later date. Accessories can be checked from the container, and recipes can be checked after unlocking synthesis. This content is included in the "Atelier Yumia - Aladiss Investigation Preparation Set." Please check the official "Atelier Yumia" site for details.
70050000054171.intro: A useful accessory for your investigation!
70050000054171.name: Exclusive Equipment "Training Wrist Weight"
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence, coarse language and sexualised imagery

70050000054174.description:
Costume palette changes for Yumia, Flammi, Viktor, Isla, Rutger, Nina, and Lenja (2 for each character, 14 total), three "Puni Badge" accessories, and the recipe for Puni Badges. While equipped, Puni Badges increase the experience gained from defeating Puni-type monsters by 50% and guarantee that they will drop items.

List of Contents:
- Exclusive Equipment "Puni Badge"
- "Bright Snow" Costume for Yumia
- "Isla Orange" Costume for Yumia
- "Sphere" Costume for Flammi
- "Tripod" Costume for Flammi
- "Shadow Knight" Costume for Viktor
- "Golden Soldier" Costume for Viktor
- "Mana Aqua" Costume for Isla
- "Yumia Navy" Costume for Isla
- "Meteor Fire" Costume for Rutger
- "Pure Soul" Costume for Rutger
- "Corundum Purple" Costume for Nina
- "Silver Hunter" Costume for Nina
- "Natural Leaf" Costume for Lenja

70070000026145.description:
People gather memories as they live their lives, thus developing their souls. This is the story of a young woman traveling across a ruined continent to find the path toward the future.

The theme of this game is "memory." There are moments when everyone must confront the past and their own memories. All memories, including both successes and failures, become nourishment for the future and help shape people. "Atelier Yumia" tells the story of Yumia and her companions as they follow the path they believe in while being confronted by the memories they discover along the way.

List of Contents:
• The main game
• Atelier Yumia - Colorful Collection
Costume palette changes for Yumia, Flammi, Viktor, Isla, Rutger, Nina, and Lenja (2 for each character, 14 total), three "Puni Badge" accessories, and the recipe for Puni Badges. While equipped, Puni Badges increase the experience gained from defeating Puni-type monsters by 50% and guarantee that they will drop items.

Note:
- Please check the official "Atelier Yumia" site for details.
- Costumes are available after unlocking base building and placing a Dressing Room (the relevant characters must also have joined your party). Accessories can be checked from the container, and recipes can be checked after unlocking synthesis.
- Please be aware that other editions containing this product exist. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
- Please be aware that the main game is also available for purchase as a standalone product. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
70070000026145.intro:
Walk the forbidden path, no matter where it leads.
A premium edition including costumes fit for a memory-filled adventure.
70070000026145.name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land Digital Deluxe Edition

70050000050763.description:
Add the Carthage civilization for The Antiquity Age to your collection in Sid Meier's Civilization® VII as part of the Crossroads of the World Collection DLC!*

From humble colony to economic hegemony, Carthage rose from the shores of North Africa to dominate the Mediterranean Sea. Its sleek ships ferried goods and riches all over the known world, while at home, the city of Carthage was famed for its master craftsmen and deep agricultural knowledge. Competition with first Greece, then Rome, honed renowned generals and a powerful navy. But war was Carthage’s undoing, and the city was destroyed in 149 BCE.

*Carthage civilization is part of the Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection DLC. The Crossroads of the World Collection is included as post-launch DLC in the Deluxe and Founders Editions of Sid Meier's Civilization VII. It is also available for separate purchase (base game required). Exact release date to be announced post-launch and subject to change. Terms apply.
70050000050763.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Carthage Pack

70050000050764.description:
Add the leader Ada Lovelace to your collection in Sid Meier's Civilization® VII as part of the Crossroads of the World Collection DLC!*

From childhood, Ada Lovelace inspected the world through a scientist’s eyes. Forging a path between intellectualism and imagination, she applied her mathematical mind to the nineteenth century’s most cutting-edge experiments. Working with mechanical computers, which made calculations using gears and punch cards, she designed the first computer program, establishing the field of computing over a century before technology caught up to her vision.

*Ava Lovelace leader is part of the Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection DLC. The Crossroads of the World Collection is included as post-launch DLC in the Deluxe and Founders Editions of Sid Meier's Civilization VII. It is also available for separate purchase (base game required). Exact release date to be announced post-launch and subject to change. Terms apply.
70050000050764.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Ada Lovelace Pack

70050000050765.description:
Add the Great Britain civilization for The Modern Age to your collection in Sid Meier's Civilization® VII as part of the Crossroads of the World Collection DLC!*

The sun never set on Great Britain’s vast empire. Its territories spread across all continents, funneling raw materials from colonial holdings to the factories of the metropole. Foreign policy was conducted through economic strategy, extensive diplomacy, and threat of war. The British navy dominated the seas, while at home, society found a new order amid the explosion of industry. Under Pax Britannica, the world followed Britain’s lead.

*Great Britain civilization is part of the Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection DLC. The Crossroads of the World Collection is included as post-launch DLC in the Deluxe and Founders Editions of Sid Meier's Civilization VII. It is also available for separate purchase (base game required). Exact release date to be announced post-launch and subject to change. Terms apply.
70050000050765.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Great Britain Pack

70050000050766.description:
Add the leader Simón Bolívar to your collection in Sid Meier's Civilization® VII as part of the Crossroads of the World Collection DLC!*

As the Napoleonic Wars weakened Spain’s presence in the Americas, Simón Bolívar, "El Libertador," led forces to liberate the region. With tenacity and charisma, he led his armies to victory, and the people to independence. The instability of newfound freedom proved difficult to overcome. First president and then dictator of Gran Colombia, he failed to fully enact his ambitions. Yet Bolívar remains an enduring example of South American defiance.

*Simón Bolívar leader is part of the Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection DLC. The Crossroads of the World Collection is included as post-launch DLC in the Deluxe and Founders Editions of Sid Meier's Civilization VII. It is also available for separate purchase (base game required). Exact release date to be announced post-launch and subject to change. Terms apply.
70050000050766.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Simón Bolívar Pack

70050000050767.description:
Add the Bulgaria civilization to your collection for The Exploration Age in Sid Meier's Civilization® VII as part of the Crossroads of the World Collection DLC!*

In the seventh century, the Bulgars crossed the Danube and made the Balkans their own. Their warriors used the mountains to their advantage, scattering larger armies through skill and stratagems. The First Bulgarian Empire ran on conquest, expansion, and the growth of trade. The Second Empire saw the rise of art, literature, and architecture alongside spirituality and monastic traditions. All came crashing down when the Ottomans invaded.

*Bulgaria civilization is part of the Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection DLC. The Crossroads of the World Collection is included as post-launch DLC in the Deluxe and Founders Editions of Sid Meier's Civilization VII. It is also available for separate purchase (base game required). Exact release date to be announced post-launch and subject to change. Terms apply.
70050000050767.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Bulgaria Pack

70050000050768.description:
Add the Nepal civilization to your collection for The Modern Age in Sid Meier's Civilization® VII as part of the Crossroads of the World Collection DLC!*

Nestled high in the Himalayas, and incorporating both highland Buddhist and lowland Hindu populations, Nepal has clung to its sovereignty despite its precarious location. 19th century Nepal was governed by an autocratic group of families, and guarded by the fierce Gurkha warriors. Following an agreement with the British, they maintained a degree of independence at the crown of the world. 

*Nepal civilization is part of the Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection DLC. The Crossroads of the World Collection is included as post-launch DLC in the Deluxe and Founders Editions of Sid Meier's Civilization VII. It is also available for separate purchase (base game required). Exact release date to be announced post-launch and subject to change. Terms apply.
70050000050768.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Nepal Pack

70050000050769.description:
Explore new possibilities for your personalized empire with four new Natural Wonders: Machapuchare, Mount Fuji, Vihren, and Vinicunca!

*Crossroads of the World Collection - Wonder Pack is part of the Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection DLC. The Crossroads of the World Collection is included as post-launch DLC in the Deluxe and Founders Editions of Sid Meier's Civilization VII. It is also available for separate purchase (base game required). Exact release date to be announced post-launch and subject to change. Terms apply.
70050000050769.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection - Wonder Pack

70010000069413.description:
Which Way Up: Galaxy Games is a family friendly party game that gives unique freedom of movement by allowing you to run on walls and ceilings, orbit around planets, or fall across entire levels by manoeuvring through gravity fields.

Each of our 12 Gravity Games feature their own unique bite-sized challenge where up to 4 players compete. Eject your friends into space, score a goal with an entire moon, leap across planets to escape a black hole, capture and hold zodiacal constellations and much more!

Game Features:

◆  Up to 4 players local play
◆  7 cute, cosmic characters to choose from
◆  12 gravity-defying, customisable mini-games
◆  A collection of single-player challenges


Characters:

♣ Sprout represents nature and all living things.
◈ Prism represents electromagnetic radiation that can be perceived by the human eye.
◐ Luna represents the night and shifting tides.
☀ Sunny represents the star at the centre of our solar system.
⊕ Maggie represents magnetic fields which allow attraction and repulsion.
★ Spark represents a shining star, who gains fervent followers through every galaxy and is admired for being the brightest of all.
◯ Orbit represents the curved paths objects follow when affected by gravity.


Galaxy Games:

Each of the 12 Galaxy Game features its own unique bite-sized challenge where up to 4 players can compete, all revolving around the core idea of gravity. 

Ⅰ - CONSTELLATION CATCH
Race across the universe to capture as many constellations as you can. Constellations are fickle beasts, though. They can be stolen from under your nose! Protect yours and poach theirs.

Ⅱ - EVENT HORIZON
Players are being sucked into a BLACK HOLE! Platform away from its relentless pull. Knock the opposition away with your COMET PUSH ability and be the last one standing!

Ⅲ GRAVAPULT
Protect your precious planets against the volley of the opposition's bombs, while lobbing your own counter-offensive bombardment.

Ⅳ COMET COLLECT
High energy Comets are valuable to the Celestial characters! Control Comets by nudging them with the COMET PUSH ability and gather as many as you can in your own base.

Ⅴ STAR RING
The Star Ring is the place to be. Jostle with friends to remain in its wandering light, the only place that fills your scorebar. The brightest, fullest player wins!

Ⅵ - OVERLOAD
UNSTABLE ENERGY has infected one of the Celestials. Discharge the energy to another player before you OVERLOAD!

Ⅶ - NEBULA NAB
Gather and deliver Pips to the Atom and knock your opponent’s Pips away! The more Pips follow you, the heavier you get. Beware—the ATOM’s capacity is limited, so don’t get caught hoarding them! 

Ⅷ - HOLE-IN-ONE
Be the first to get a hole-in-one across six interstellar golf greens. After a player makes it in, competitors have one final shot. With only two balls active at a time, every shot counts!

Ⅸ - BERRY BARRAGE
Dodge an onslaught of cosmic fruit! Avoid Jelly Berries or use your COMET PUSH ability to redirect them, and steer clear of Blast Berries. Maneuver through the fruity chaos with precision and skill!

Ⅹ - PUFF PANIC
Navigate the orbiting ruins around PUFF the baby dragon's home! Avoid PUFF's fireball flurries, while jumping across crumbling platforms. Can you survive PUFF’s playful onslaught?

Ⅺ - BUMPER STARS
Charge into a bumper battle in a thrilling cosmic showdown. Bump your friends into stars or out of screen: Every bump counts in this exhilarating space battle!

Ⅻ - GASTRONOMER
Jump into the skin of the Gastronomer and devour everything in your path! Celestials must bomb the Gastronomer to knock the Gastronomer out and get their chance to dominate the cosmic feast!


Single-Player Mode:

Go on adventures with the Celestial characters to complete increasingly difficult levels! Platform in complicated dynamic settings, rescue and deliver pips into atoms, practice hole-in-ones in dynamic stages and skilfully shoot comets into bases.
70010000069413.intro: A 2-4 player local party game with 12 gravity-inspired mini-games called the Galaxy Games!
70010000069413.name: Which Way Up: Galaxy Games

70010000070914.description:
The old castle of the renowned inventor Heinrich Von Schinker, in northern England, Heinrich's spirit returns as a small ghost.

Alongside a mysterious bubble that he can move with gentle blows, he must face his own out-of-control inventions and fierce wild animals.

Guiding the bubble to freedom is his only goal.

GAME MODES:
- Challenge Your Skills: Overcome levels filled with dangers and puzzles that will test your abilities. With addictive gameplay and devilish difficulty, your only goal is to protect the bubble at all costs.

- Defeat Epic Bosses: Face fierce bosses that will make you sweat. Only the most skilled will emerge victorious.

- Relive the Original Classic: Enjoy the full remaster of the 90s game, with 36 original levels recreated with completely renewed art.

- Compete for Glory: Perfect your times in speedrun mode and submit your results online to secure your place in the prestigious Hall of Fame.

MORE INFO:
- Enjoy an adventure with over 40 levels filled with skill and clever puzzles.

- Three difficulty levels tailored to your playstyle.

- Completely revamped graphics and sound that bring the magical world of the castle to life.

- Dive deep into Heinrich's story by finding hidden collectibles throughout the castle chambers.

- Upload your scores and compare them with the best players worldwide in the online ranking.

- Discover secret rooms, alternative endings, and unlock challenging in-game achievements.
70010000070914.intro: Guide a little ghost and his bubble through an enchanted castle full of dangers and challenges in this incredible remake of the popular classic "Bubble Ghost".
70010000070914.name: Bubble Ghost Remake

70010000073412.description: Freeride is a game about YOU. Board a train to the Spirit World in our oddball RPG where you make friends, use telekinesis, find secrets, consume ice cream and chart your own path. Each character is uniquely troubled, and in helping them find their way, you might just find yourself, too.
70010000073412.intro: The RPG that's (not-so) secretly a Personality test!
70010000073412.name: Freeride

70010000088380.description:
Dive into a world of fun and adventure with the Care Bears in  "Care Bears: Unlock the Magic". Play as Cheer Bear as and his friends in a variety of arcade games!

Meet the Care Bears: Play alongside Cheer Bear, Bedtime Bear, Tenderheart Bear and all the lovely bears from Care A-Lot!

Go on a Journey: Explore over 200 levels across a dozen unique minigames in the whimsical universe of Care Bears! Get Star Power to remove the Storm Clouds from the Silver Lining, meet the funny Whiffles and reach the end of the magical road for a lovely surprise.

Classic Arcade Fun: Enjoy a variety of themed mini-games inspired by classic arcade favorites: Care Bubbles, Cross The Rainbow, Lost Whiffle and many more!

Fill the Art Book: As you progress, earn unique stickers featuring art and bears from the "Care Bears: Unlock The Magic"" tv show. Collect them all!
70010000088380.intro: Dive into a world of fun and adventure with the Care Bears in  "Care Bears: Unlock the Magic" Play as Cheer Bear as and his friends in a variety of arcade games!
70010000088380.name: Care Bears: Unlock The Magic

70010000089959.description:
Defend the galaxy in Space Battle, the last bastion against the imperial attack!

In this thrilling game of strategy and action, you take command of a spacecraft at the edge of the known galaxy, facing waves of enemy attacks in a desperate fight for survival. Each round is a race against time: destroy enemy stations before their fleets converge and launch a full-scale assault on your ship.

DEFEND YOUR SPACE STATION
Each round challenges you to balance defense and offense. Plan your strategy and execute your best plan to survive.

DESTROY THE EMPIRE
With each enemy station destroyed, the empire returns stronger, ensuring each round is more challenging than the last.

MINE RESOURCES
Navigate the reaches of space in search of precious minerals. Each expedition offers the chance to strengthen your ship and discover forgotten technologies.

SPACE EXPLORATION
Portals will allow you to travel between the different sectors offering new areas to explore and greater challenges.

UPGRADE SYSTEM
Utilize mineral resources from nearby asteroids to power up your ship and spacecraft fleet. Each upgrade is crucial to tipping the scales in your favor.

Space Battle not only tests your strategic skills but also your ability to make quick decisions under pressure. Are you ready to take up the challenge and defend your ship against the relentless forces of the empire?
70010000089959.intro: Pilot your ship through dangerous space and defend against relentless imperial attacks in Space Battle, a high-intensity round-based strategy game.
70010000089959.name: Space Battle

70010000090127.description: "Perfect Hand of Nostalpix" is a classic digital card game where players collect cards, level up, and evolve to build the perfect deck. With a unique world and strategic gameplay, the goal is to defeat enemies in search of the perfect hand, the ultimate decisive move!
70010000090127.intro: Gather you cards and it's time to duel!
70010000090127.name: Perfect Hand of Nostalpix

70010000092844.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of East River, Korea with "Real" footage! 
This work takes place in East River. 
There are a total of 10 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to 10 locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit East River, Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000092844.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000092844.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour East River

70010000079396.description:
Join Bios stranded on a distant alien planet with his hoverboard, solve creative puzzles, and fight formidable foes in his quest to reunite with his beloved. Wield the powers of his Keytar for combat, master the hypersonic Hoverboard for trick-filled traversal, uncover mysterious depths, gather resources, and craft parts to enhance your Hoverboard and explore across alien biomes in a massive Open World.  

Unleash the power of music! Wield your keytar to battle enemies, bend the laws of physics, and solve intricate puzzles. Explore abandoned places where your tapes are the key to survival and discovery.

Experience the thrill of speed with the advanced hoverboard. Explore vast landscapes, perform incredible tricks, and gain the edge in intense combat. Speed through missions with unmatched agility and style. Are you ready to hover to victory?

Crash land on an epic journey across a vast, abandoned alien planet! Uncover its secrets as you face relentless enemies, tackle formidable challenges, and navigate through constant danger. Explore the unknown and survive against all odds!
70010000079396.name: Star Overdrive

70010000079959.description:
The protagonist, who has been alone, is led to the guild  after finding a letter from thegrandfather. Though the grandfather is nowhere to be found at the guild, the protagonist decides to work there in search of more clues. Through a ritual to become the guild staff member, the protagonist gains the ability of “Clairvoyance”, which allows seeing and hearing through the eyes of others.

You can choose between a Male or Female character. Use various facilities like the Blacksmith, Item Shop and Garden to support each of the unique adventurers at the 3D-rendered guild.

Complex dungeons progress automatically for each party, and you may choose to step in during monster encounters, which develop into the thrilling, strategic “Reading Command” battles. You can alternatively have the adventurers fight on their own and focus on your other tasks!

 include 6 members, 3 men and 3 women. Each of your stories with them will unfold as you develop further relationships with the partners. Build up your guild while getting closer with your favorite partners!
70010000079959.intro:
is the guild where many adventurers meet.
Your unique story begins as you support your companions as the guild master!
70010000079959.name: PROGRESS ORDERS

70010000092822.description:
Pilo and the Holobook is an exploration-based adventure game set in a colorful galaxy where you guide Pilo, an apprentice explorer, on a journey to document the universe’s wonders and solve mysteries. Using the Holobook, a powerful encyclopedia-like tool, Pilo collects stickers to record his discoveries and uncover the story behind a mysterious dark force known as the Tar.


Key Features:

- Holobook Sticker System: Collect and customize stickers that document your findings in the Holobook, creating a personalized in-game encyclopedia.
- Beautiful, Hand-Painted Planets: Immerse yourself in visually stunning environments that tell the story of each unique world. Explore Floral Asteroid, sunny SRTOM and play along Prof in Labship.
- Environmental Puzzles: Use the Holobook’s abilities to solve light environmental challenges and uncover hidden areas.
- Thematic Depth: Dive into a heartwarming story about mentorship, friendship, and confronting environmental decay through compassion and creativity.
- Evolving Holobook: As you progress, the Holobook gains new capabilities, allowing deeper interactions with the world around them.
- Engaging Story: Unravel the mystery of the Tar and its impact on the planets, with meaningful encounters and touching character moments.


Discover more about  Pilo and the Holobook


Cosmic Odyssey
Set in the mystical XOP-642 star system, players guide Pilo through vibrant, hand-painted worlds filled with strange creatures and ecosystems. Each planet is teeming with unique flora and fauna to discover. Instead of combat, Pilo uses observation and creativity to explore these planets, collecting valuable knowledge through the Holobook.


The Holobook: Your Gateway to Knowledge
The Holobook serves as your main tool throughout the journey. Players use it to interact with the environment and creatures, turning their findings into collectible stickers that populate an ever-growing encyclopedia. These stickers record your progress, unlock new abilities, and help solve environmental puzzles.


The Shadow of the Tar
An ominous, mysterious substance called the Tar has begun to spread across the galaxy, threatening the beautiful worlds Pilo explores. Along the journey, players will uncover the origins of the Tar and work to save the planets from its corruption. The Holobook can also temporarily repel the Tar, allowing deeper exploration and interaction with affected creatures.


A Heartfelt Adventure
Pilo and the Holobook emphasize creativity, kindness, and curiosity over combat. The game encourages peaceful problem-solving and compassion as Pilo helps the creatures affected by the Tar and works to restore balance to the galaxy.
70010000092822.intro: Join Pilo and Prof in a new space adventure! Use your Holobook to turn everything into stickers and create your own encyclopedia of a new world.
70010000092822.name: Pilo and the Holobook
